body.name: CRYSTAL Mineral Deodorant Roll-On- Body Deodorant With 24-Hour Odor Protection, Non-Staining & Non-Sticky Deodorant with Chamomile & Green Tea, Aluminium Chloride & Paraben Free, 2.25 FL OZ - 3 Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 39 mins
features: THE OG MINERAL DEODORANT: 35 years ago, we invented the original mineral salt deodorant, making it the first naturally-derived one ingredient deodorant on the market.

CRYSTAL CLEAR INGREDIENTS: Crystal is the only deodorant brand to receive Clean Label Project Purity Award for ALL of our deodorants. We never use aluminum, parabens, sulfates, phthalates artificial fragrances, or colors. Period.

GENTLE AND INVISBLE: Tire of rashes caused by other natural deodorant? Crystal body deodorant is dermatologist tested to be hypoallergenic, gentle on the skin, and dries quickly. Even better: no streaks, white marks, or staining.

SMELL GOOD NATURALLY: Regular deodorant blocks your pores which is pretty gross when you think about it. Crystal doesn’t do that. In fact, Crystal deodorants allow the body to function naturally and control odors for up to 24 hours with natural minerals.
GOOD VIBES ONLY: Crystal non aluminum deodorant is vegan, cruelty-free, safe, and effective. We never test our products on animals and use the cleanest, safest ingredients available.
body.description: CRYSTAL Mineral-Enriched Deodorant Roll-On rapidly dries to provide an invisible, protective barrier that blocks odor for up to 24 hours. Made with natural mineral salt. Vegan, Cruelty Free, and Made for every BODY!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yay!! I no longer smell sweaty!!
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking like so many others for a deodorant that will last the whole day. I have tried natural ones and I always could smell the deodorant and body odor. I was nervous to raise my arms or even hug someone always thinking they are going to smell my sweat. But this deodorant is a game changer, when you put it on it can smell strong but that goes away. What doesn't happen is I don't smell my body odor. I smell nothing just my perfume. I don't feel self conscious when hugging or even raising my arms. This works so good and is long lasting. The only time I slightly smelled sweat was after a long day at the amusement park on a hot day. I mean it wasn't till I was home and changing that I got a slight whiff of sweat. I even had my husband smell my pits and ask him if it was bad. He said only if his nose is right in my pits could he smell it, other then that he smelled nothing. So of course I repeated this with my kids and I got the same results. I have found a deodorant that works and doesn't irritate my skin. My new holy grail of deodorants.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this deodorant. I have used this particular brand for a long time. Good, safe ingredients. You should try it! I truly don’t think you will be disappointed! Good price, too! Fast delivery! Thanks Amazon! :))

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent fragrance, no itchiness, and very effective for dealing with sweat
reviews.reviewText: This deodorant and this fragrance, specifically, are my go to for a year-round deodorant option.I'm a 50 year old male with fairly decent eating habits which means that my sweat is no longer as acidic or acrid as it used to be when I was in my twenties and early thirties. I also sweat a little less than I did back then as my system is in a better state of balance.However, be aware that this is not going to stop you sweating - it's not designed to do so, and I don't think that kind of product is healthy. Out bodies are designed to perspire for a multiple reasons - the process of sweating helps to cool us, and it also gives us a way of shedding some of the toxins we build up in daily life.What this does do, very effectively in my opinion, is to mitigate the odor which comes from the bacteria which feed on our sweat, and hence to keep you feeling a little more human in summer. I think it may also help to stop that fisrt very light sheen of sweat you can get when you get nervous (let's call it an arbitrary stage one perspiration level), but as soon as you start exercising it will work to minimize the effects such that you don't have offensive BO. In winter I find I'm odor free for 48 hours unless I break a sweat in that time which allows me to shower every other day without having the faintest trace of body odor.Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This works well, but not sure about the potassium alum in it...
reviews.reviewText: Let me start by saying this is the only "non-aluminum" deodorant that has worked for me, personally. I know a lot of people swear by natural name brands, but I feel like I've tried so many and they just end up making me change my shirts multiple times a day. I put non-aluminum in quotes bc one of the ingredients is potassium alum. I've decided to continue to use this since it works great for me (I have the lavender & white tea scent). It also doesn't sting after shaving like my other products do, and keeps my white shirts white. Definitely not 24-hr protection, though. Maybe like 4-5 hrs, then I reapply. *I still sweat with this, but it allows me to manage odor, which was my main goal.*The cons: in the specs on the product page, it literally says "aluminum free", twice. I am confused by this since they advertise having potassium alum in this product, and that it's better than the competitor's aluminum. Just because it's natural, doesn't mean it's not there. Pecans are natural, but you wouldn't put "nut free" on a product made with pecans. That makes it so that when you search for aluminum free deodorant, this one pops up, which is quite deceptive from the sale of a product that is also advertising that they wouldn't harm your body with things you wouldn't want to be putting on it as their competitor's products do... while simultaneously deciding on behalf of the consumer that potassium alum is not aluminum because the seller doesn't think it's harmful, when that should be up to the individual purchasing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my tried and true! I can't use regular deodarant, have tried countless "natural" ones and this is the only brand that doesn't irritate me, prevents odor, and just works fantastically! My favorite is the lavender one, but I've tried the other ones and haven't been disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smooth, clear roll on application is great - but it doesn’t cover up BO very well.
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a natural deodorant and have tried several on the market. This is my favorite application that I’ve tried so far! I like the roll on method because I have found other regular deodorants tend to clump up and make a mess when applying. The roll on goes on nice and smooth and I love that it’s clear! Yes you may need to wait a minute or two to let it dry before putting your shirt but it’s not a big deal.My reason for going with 3 stars is that the smell is very mild - which is fine for me because I don’t like super strong scents. However, I have found that it’s too mild because it doesn’t cover up body odor for very long. It will for a couple hours maybe but after that it’s useless unless your constantly reapplying. Ultimately it’s better than applying nothing but it’s not something that will last all day, especially if you are sweating a lot. I’ve almost felt like the scent has made me smell worse compared to days I haven’t applied it at all.Overall, I would say it’s cheap enough to give it a try for yourself and see if you like it. Everyone’s body odors and hormones are different. Personally my search to finding a good natural deodorant will continue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My favorite deodorant, doesn’t leave stickiness, pleasant smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t work for me
reviews.reviewText: Does not work for me whatsoever. Not sure if it is because I’m newly postpartum but prior to having my baby I was using the Thai brand crystal deodorant and it worked wonders! So I was in need of a new one and wanted to try this one after reading the reviews and it sounded promising. Unfortunately doesn’t work. I do like the light scent and that doesn’t feel sticky after it dries.

reviews.reviewTitle: Funcional y efectivo y NO MANCHA TU ROPA
reviews.reviewText: No tienen un aroma fuerte, pero evitan el mal olor. Después de años de probar todos los desodorantes que prometen no manchar la ropa, estos son los únicos que NO MANCHAN en absoluto. Llevo más de 2 años utilizando este y otros productos de la marca y de verdad funcionan.Ojo: si tu ropa tiene la mancha de desodorantes previos es posible que sientas que hueles mal, pero esto irá cambiando conforme tu ropa se vaya lavando y esas manchas y suciedad removiendo. Ten paciencia, vale la pena.
I struggle with deodorants and am very sensitive but love this one!

reviews.reviewTitle: Does not last more than two hours
reviews.reviewText: I like it because it’s skin friendly without sulphates. But it’s not value for money expensive for its performance

Es ist ein stinknormaler Rolon.Nur, dass er überhaupt nicht vor Schweißgeruch schützt!!!Der Preis ist der Brüller! Einfach weg geschmissenes Geld. Sehr schade. Den einzigen Stern vergebe ich für den netten Geruch des Deos. Sonst leider ein absoluter Fehlkauf !!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Doesn't irritate my skin and keeps me smelling fresh
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many many aluminum free/natural deodorants and find this to be the best by far. It has a lovely smell, doesn't irritate my skin and keeps me smelling fresh which is exactly what you need. Will definitely continue to buy this brand.
